preface.title: About This Manual
preface.para: This manual offers an introduction to setting up and managing virtualization with &kvm; (Kernel-based Virtual Machine) on &productname;. The first part introduces &kvm; by describing it's requirements and &novell;'s support status. The second part deals with managing &kvm; with &libvirt;, while the last part covers management with &qemu;.

Many chapters in this manual contain links to additional documentation resources. This includes additional documentation that is available on the system as well as documentation available on the Internet.
